abstract: Suspected member of Boko Haram kills 21 people in suicide bomb attack on Shiite procession between two Nigerian cities.
lead_paragraph: The attack occurred during an annual religious procession from Kano, Nigeria’s second-largest city, to Zaria.

headline.main: Nigeria: Boko Haram Is Suspected as Suicide Bomber Kills 21 Shiites
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Boko Haram Is Suspected as Suicide Bomber Kills 21 Shiites

snippet: The attack occurred during an annual religious procession from Kano, Nigeria’s second-largest city, to Zaria.
